org.apache.edgent.graph.spi

Class DirectEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.edgent.graph.spi.DirectEdge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Edge

    public class DirectEdge
extends Object
implements Edge
    This class provides a simple implementation of the Edge interface in the context of a DirectProvider.
